item.title: Microsoft pushes the intelligent edge forward at Build
item.description: Microsoft pushes the intelligent edge forward at Build [<href=“https://siliconangle.com/2019/05/06/microsoft-pushes-intelligent-edge-forward-build/” target="_blank>read more] - Microsoft Corp. continues to rack up impressive momentum in the cloud arena, a trend that it shifted into high gear Monday at its annual Build developer conference. The tech giant launched an impressive range of innovations in platforms, tools, cloud service… [+10120 chars]
